## Chapter 18 Exercises

### Problem 18.1

1. living area, bathrooms, fireplaces

2. For houses with a living area less than 1080 square feet, the number of bathrooms will not make a difference in price.

3. For houses with a living area between 1080 and 1483 square feet, the price of houses with 1.5 baths is 151424.197 dollars, and the price of houses with 2 bathrooms is 179796.647 dollars. The typical difference between them is 28372.45 dollars.

4. Only when the living area is greater than 2816 square feet, the house will set up fireplaces, so it is associated with a higher house price. And the number of fireplaces will also cause the drffernce of price.
